Security.name: Security
Security.doctrine: Protect user data with explicit trust boundaries, validated inputs, and immediate remediation when risk is found.
principles: Document and patch security regressions immediately
Security.remediationStyle: Direct and fail-safe. Prioritize containment and explicit fixes.

Access.name: Access
Access.belief: If someone cannot use it, it is not finished.
Access.doctrine: Accessibility ensures equal product access across screen readers, keyboard-only users, contrast needs, and focus navigation.
principles: Accessible names and alt text for assistive tech
Adequate color contrast and visible focus
Access.remediationStyle: Respect-first. Fix barriers with explicit user-path verification.

Testing.name: Testing
Testing.belief: Tests prove user behavior, not vanity metrics.
Testing.doctrine: Prioritize integration and end-to-end confidence, mock external dependencies deterministically, and guard critical deterministic logic.
principles: Add regression tests for behavior changes
Use deterministic mocking for external dependencies
Use E2E coverage for critical workflows
antiPatterns: Tests that hit live external APIs
Testing.remediationStyle: Evidence-based. Require tests that catch user-impacting failures.

Execution.name: Execution
Execution.belief: Quality is measured at the finish line.
Execution.doctrine: Do not merge with unresolved blockers: red CI, unresolved critical review threads, or known broken checks.
antiPatterns: Deferring critical breakage to future PRs
Execution.remediationStyle: Finish-line discipline. Resolve blockers before shipment.

Scales.name: Scales
Scales.doctrine: Avoid over-engineering and hard ceilings by keeping systems modular and proportionate to present load.
principles: Control blast radius in large changes
antiPatterns: Monolithic coupling that prevents independent scaling
Scales.remediationStyle: Architectural pragmatism with explicit growth safeguards.

Value.name: Value
Value.doctrine: Every change must produce user or product value with explicit rationale, not low-signal churn.
principles: Keep cognitive load proportional to value
antiPatterns: Feature additions with no outcome rationale
Value.remediationStyle: Outcome-focused. Require specific impact and rationale.

Aesthetics.name: Aesthetics
Aesthetics.doctrine: Shipped UI must be responsive, cohesive, and aligned with agreed design-system conventions.
principles: Preserve visual consistency on touched surfaces
Aesthetics.remediationStyle: Cohesion-first. Fix visual regressions and restore intentional UI quality.
